description.black-white:
A column of grass hits opposing Pokémon.
When used with its water equivalent, its
damage increases into a vast swamp.
description.black-2-white-2:
A column of grass hits opposing Pokémon.
When used with its water equivalent, its
damage increases into a vast swamp.
description.x-y:
A column of grass hits the target. When used with
its water equivalent, its damage increases and
a vast swamp appears.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon used fire pledge earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon will take 1/8 their max HP in damage at the end of every turn for four turns (including this one).
effect.shortEffect: With Fire Pledge, damages opposing Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP every turn for four turns.
